StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetPooleeReferrals]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@NwaID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @Type VARCHAR (10)) AS BEGIN SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER OFF
CREATE TABLE #tempResult ( ProspectId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, NwaId UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, SocialSecurityNumber VARCHAR (13), Name VARCHAR (100), SSN VARCHAR (13), IsContract BIT, Disposi.on VARCHAR (40) )
DECLARE @referralSSN VARCHAR (9)
SELECT @referralSSN = p.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER FROM MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON p.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID WHERE n.rowguid = @NwaID
SELECT DISTINCT p.SocialSecurityNumber, pr.ProspectId, pr.CreatedDate, CASE WHEN p.SocialSecurityNumber IS NOT NULL THEN ( MAX (pr.CreatedDate) OVER (PARTITION BY p.SocialSecurityNumber)) ELSE ( MAX (pr.CreatedDate) OVER (PARTITION BY pr.ProspectId) ) END AS MostCurrentCreateDate INTO #tempProspect FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person p ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p2 ON p2.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = p.SocialSecurityNumber LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = p2.PERSON_ID WHERE pr.ReferralSSN = @referralSSN AND NwaId IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT SocialSecurityNumber, NwaId, NWA_ID, MostCurrentNwaId, (SELECT rowguid FROM MCRISS.dbo.NWA WHERE NWA_ID = MostCurrentNwaId) AS MostCurrentNwaRowGuid INTO #tempNwa FROM (SELECT p.SocialSecurityNumber, pr.NwaId, n.NWA_ID, MAX (n.NWA_ID) OVER (PARTITION BY p.SocialSecurityNumber) AS MostCurrentNwaId FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect pr INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.Person p ON pr.PersonId = p.PersonId LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.PERSON p2 ON p2.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = p.SocialSecurityNumber LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = p2.PERSON_ID WHERE pr.ReferralSSN = @referralSSN AND NwaId IS NOT NULL) AS T
IF (@Type = 'Poolee') BEGIN INSERT INTO #tempResult SELECT DISTINCT p.ProspectId, p.NwaId, ps.SocialSecurityNumber, ps.LastName + ', ' + ps.FirstName + ' ' + isnull (ps.MiddleName, '') Name, CASE WHEN ps.SocialSecurityNumber IS NULL THEN '' ELSE LEFT (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 3) + '-' + SUBSTRING (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 4, 2) + '-' + RIGHT (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 4) END AS SSN, --,c.CONTRACT_ID CASE WHEN c.CONTRACT_ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsContract, ISNULL ( (SELECT TOP 1 sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION sd ON cs.STATUS_TYPE = sd.STATUS_TYPE AND cs.STATUS_CODE = sd.STATUS_CODE AND cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = sd.DISPOSITION_CODE WHERE cs.NWA_ID = n2.NWA_ID ORDER BY cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID DESC), (SELECT TOP 1 ProspectDisposi.onType FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect s INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on pd ON s.ProspectDisposi.onId = pd.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE s.ProspectID = p.ProspectId )) AS Disposi.on --,case when c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE is null then 0 else 1 end as IsContract FROM USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.Person ps ON ps.PersonId = P.PersonId AND p.source = 'DEP' INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person mp ON mp.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = p.ReferralSSN INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.Rowguid = @NwaID AND mp.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN #tempProspect tp ON p.ProspectId = tp.ProspectId AND p.CreatedDate = tp.MostCurrentCreateDate LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n2 ON n2.Rowguid = p.NwaId LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract c ON n2.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID WHERE p.NwaId IS NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT p.ProspectId, p.NwaId, ps.SocialSecurityNumber, ps.LastName + ', ' + ps.FirstName + ' ' + isnull (ps.MiddleName, '') Name, CASE WHEN ps.SocialSecurityNumber IS NULL THEN '' ELSE LEFT (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 3) + '-' + SUBSTRING (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 4, 2) + '-' + RIGHT (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 4) END AS SSN, --,c.CONTRACT_ID CASE WHEN c.CONTRACT_ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsContract, ISNULL ( (SELECT TOP 1 sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION sd ON cs.STATUS_TYPE = sd.STATUS_TYPE AND cs.STATUS_CODE = sd.STATUS_CODE AND cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = sd.DISPOSITION_CODE WHERE cs.NWA_ID = n2.NWA_ID ORDER BY cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID DESC), (SELECT TOP 1 ProspectDisposi.onType FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory s INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on pd ON s.Disposi.onID = pd.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE s.ProspectID = p.ProspectId ORDER BY s.HistoryID DESC)) AS Disposi.on --,case when c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE is null then 0 else 1 end as IsContract FROM USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.Person ps ON ps.PersonId = P.PersonId AND p.source = 'DEP' INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person mp ON mp.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = p.ReferralSSN INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.Rowguid = @NwaID AND mp.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN #tempNwa tn ON p.NwaId = tn.MostCurrentNwaRowGuid LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n2 ON n2.Rowguid = p.NwaId LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract c ON n2.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID WHERE p.NwaId IS NOT NULL END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #tempResult SELECT DISTINCT p.ProspectId, p.NwaId, ps.SocialSecurityNumber, ps.LastName + ', ' + ps.FirstName + ' ' + isnull (ps.MiddleName, '') Name, CASE WHEN ps.SocialSecurityNumber IS NULL THEN '' ELSE LEFT (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 3) + '-' + SUBSTRING (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 4, 2) + '-' + RIGHT (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 4) END AS SSN, --,c.CONTRACT_ID CASE WHEN c.CONTRACT_ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsContract, ISNULL ( (SELECT TOP 1 sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION sd ON cs.STATUS_TYPE = sd.STATUS_TYPE AND cs.STATUS_CODE = sd.STATUS_CODE AND cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = sd.DISPOSITION_CODE WHERE cs.NWA_ID = n2.NWA_ID ORDER BY cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID DESC), (SELECT TOP 1 ProspectDisposi.onType FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.Prospect s INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on pd ON s.ProspectDisposi.onId = pd.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE s.ProspectID = p.ProspectId )) AS Disposi.on --,case when c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE is null then 0 else 1 end as IsContract FROM USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.Person ps ON ps.PersonId = P.PersonId AND p.source IN ('CBL', 'CDR', 'CPT', 'CRA', 'CRAL', 'AD') INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person mp ON mp.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = p.ReferralSSN INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.Rowguid = @NwaID AND mp.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN #tempProspect tp ON p.ProspectId = tp.ProspectId AND p.CreatedDate = tp.MostCurrentCreateDate LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n2 ON n2.Rowguid = p.NwaId LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract c ON n2.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID WHERE p.NwaId IS NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT p.ProspectId, p.NwaId, ps.SocialSecurityNumber, ps.LastName + ', ' + ps.FirstName + ' ' + isnull (ps.MiddleName, '') Name, CASE WHEN ps.SocialSecurityNumber IS NULL THEN '' ELSE LEFT (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 3) + '-' + SUBSTRING (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 4, 2) + '-' + RIGHT (ps.SocialSecurityNumber, 4) END AS SSN, --,c.CONTRACT_ID CASE WHEN c.CONTRACT_ID IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS IsContract, ISNULL ( (SELECT TOP 1 sd.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.STATUS_DISPOSITION sd ON cs.STATUS_TYPE = sd.STATUS_TYPE AND cs.STATUS_CODE = sd.STATUS_CODE AND cs.DISPOSITION_CODE = sd.DISPOSITION_CODE WHERE cs.NWA_ID = n2.NWA_ID ORDER BY cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID DESC), (SELECT TOP 1 ProspectDisposi.onType FROM Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectStatusHistory s INNER JOIN Prospec.ng.USMC.ProspectDisposi.on pd ON s.Disposi.onID = pd.ProspectDisposi.onId WHERE s.ProspectID = p.ProspectId ORDER BY s.HistoryID DESC)) AS Disposi.on --,case when c.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE is null then 0 else 1 end as IsContract FROM USMC.Prospect P INNER JOIN USMC.Person ps ON ps.PersonId = P.PersonId AND p.source IN ('CBL', 'CDR', 'CPT', 'CRA', 'CRAL', 'AD') INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person mp ON mp.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = p.ReferralSSN INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n ON n.Rowguid = @NwaID AND mp.PERSON_ID = n.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID INNER JOIN #tempNwa tn ON p.NwaId = tn.MostCurrentNwaRowGuid LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA n2 ON n2.Rowguid = p.NwaId LEFT JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Contract c ON n2.NWA_ID = c.NWA_ID WHERE p.NwaId IS NOT NULL END
SELECT * FROM #tempResult
DROP TABLE #tempProspect DROP TABLE #tempNwa DROP TABLE #tempResult END
